attributes.action: ask the Queen for a dissolution of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the Prime Minister goes to Buckingham Palace on June 27th 2007, we hereby call on him not only to tender his resignation as Prime Minister but to seek the Queen's permission to dissolve parliament so that the new Prime Minister has a popular mandate to govern

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
